titles.title: Help Grandfamilies Prevent Child Abuse Act
Help Grandfamilies Prevent Child Abuse Act
A bill to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to provide for better protections for children raised in kinship families outside of the foster care system.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
